text: Loreley "Lee" June Phillip Bell (June 10, 1928 â€“ February 25, 2020) was an American talk show host and soap opera creator. During her career on Chicago television, she hosted over 10,000 programs. Her best known works were The Bold and the Beautiful and The Young and the Restless. Bell was born in Chicago.
